Jakarta Concurrency API v3.0.5
  • All Classes
 

Uses of Package
jakarta.enterprise.concurrent.spi

  • Packages that use jakarta.enterprise.concurrent.spi 
    Package Description
    jakarta.enterprise.concurrent.spi
    Interfaces for third-party providers of thread context to implement.
  • Classes in jakarta.enterprise.concurrent.spi used by jakarta.enterprise.concurrent.spi 
    Class Description
    ThreadContextRestorer
    Restores the prior context on a thread after a contextual task or action completes.
    ThreadContextSnapshot
    An immutable snapshot of a particular type of thread context.
